item.title: Stratocumulus.cloud
item.description: TL:DR https://stratocumulus.cloud Top level domains (TLD) Every so often, I encounter a new top level domain (TLD). TLDs are at the topmost level of domains. A few of the most common are .com, .org, .net and if you are a trendy startup, .io. You can retrieve a full list of TLDs on wikipedia . Below are some of my favourite TLDs with various subdomains. .ninja coding.ninja sneaky.ninja food.ninja .
